name: Razor
body:
### Razor UO Assistant Tool
Razor requires the [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851) to be available. Most users already have this installed.


Razor is not supported on operating systems older than Windows XP.


The latest Razor releases can be found [here](https://github.com/msturgill/razor/releases/latest).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
